author: Adam Payne
title: Boris Johnson urged to close construction sites and call centres to stop the spread of the coronavirus
description: Boris Johnson is under growing pressure to step up the coronavirus lockdown by closing all non-essential workplaces. Members of Parliament have urged the Prime Minister to shut down construction sites and call centres amid concern that workers are unable to d…
content: Members of Parliament have urged Boris Johnson to close all non-essential workplaces amid concerns that workers at construction sites, call centres, and other workplaces which cannot switch to remote working, are at a growing risk of catching the coronavirus.… [+4858 chars]
